But one thing that hasn't changed for the Democrat is that she feels comfortable in her state. I'm not worried about my safety, and I feel very safe everywhere in our state, and I feel safe doing my job, Kirsten Gillibrand said after visiting Gabrielle Giffords yesterday and seeing the remarkable strides she's made since a lunatic turned a mundane supermarket meet-and-greet into a scene of horror.
